amendatorysection.catchline: Leaving child at a hospital; no prosecution for crime; hospital; duty.
amendatorysection.para: No person shall be prosecuted for any crime based solely upon the act of leaving a child thirty days old or younger in the custody of an employee on duty at a hospital licensed by the State of Nebraska. The hospital shall promptly contact appropriate authorities to take custody of the child.

source.para: Laws 2008, LB157, § 1; Laws 2008, First Spec. Sess., LB1, § 1.
